q: preparing a package of pension reform bills she said must be addressed before taking up taxes. Among her reforms is legislation requiring all new state employees to enter 401( k)- style benefit plans. We want reforms in place before there's any discussion about tax increases, said Mimi Walters , the GOP's nominee last fall for state treasurer who was trounced by incumbent Bill Lockyer .
